name: 西奥多·罗斯福
bio: 美国第26任总统，进步主义运动的领袖。以大棒政策推行外交，修建巴拿马运河。在国内推行反垄断、保护自然资源。获诺贝尔和平奖，是美国最年轻的总统。
bio_en: Twenty-sixth President who transformed America into a world power. Led the Rough Riders in the Spanish-American War. As President, he busted trusts, championed conservation by creating national parks, built the Panama Canal, and won the Nobel Peace Prize for mediating the Russo-Japanese War. His Square Deal domestic program established progressive reform.

personalEvents.title: 率领义勇骑兵
personalEvents.description: 在美西战争中率领义勇骑兵冲锋圣胡安山
personalEvents.description_en: Led the Rough Riders in their charge up San Juan Hill during the Spanish-American War

personalEvents.title: 就任总统
personalEvents.description: 麦金莱遇刺后继任，42岁成为最年轻总统
personalEvents.description_en: Succeeded to presidency after McKinley's assassination, becoming the youngest president at age 42

personalEvents.title: 获诺贝尔和平奖
personalEvents.description_en: Awarded the prize for mediating the Russo-Japanese War
